Density functional theory (DFT) calculations were performed on all the structures using the VASP package
35 . The exchange-correlation functional used the generalized gradient approximation (GGA) as parametrized by Perdew and Wang
36 . All of the calculations accounted for spin-polarization, used the Vosko-Wilk-Nusair local density approximation scheme
37 , and a cutoff energy for the projector augmented wave
38 pseudo-potential of 400 eV. Prior to performing ab initio molecular dynamics simulations, the atomic coordinates and lattice parameters of each investigated structure were fully relaxed using a convergence criterion of 10 −5 eV/cell for the total energy and 10 −4 eV/Å for the force components. A 4 × 4 × 2 and 4 × 4 × 4 Monkhorst-Pack
39
k-point sampling of the Brillouin zone was used for the monoclinic and cubic structures respectively.
